title: Follow live: Cavs take on Heat in Game 1
Padres' Arraez exits on stretcher after collision
description: San Diego Padres designated hitter Luis Arraez, who hit a drag bunt on the first pitch of his at-bat, was carted off after colliding with Mauricio Dubon on a play at first base in the first inning of Sunday's game with the Houston Astros at Daikin Park.

title: Whittaker stops Cameron in two rounds to win grudge rematch
description: Ben Whittaker tore into Liam Cameron to end their rematch in just the second round.

title: 'People can't handle the truth' - Verstappen refuses to explain penalty frustration
description: Max Verstappen has claimed people not being able to "handle the full truth" was part of the reason he couldn't explain his discontent at receiving a crucial penalty during the Saudi Arabian Grand Prix.

title: Verstappen says 'people can't handle the full truth' after Saudi penalty
description: Max Verstappen would not discuss the penalty he was given in Saudi Arabia for fear of getting into trouble, writes Andrew Benson.

title: 'Iconic moment in a special Liverpool career - but was it a farewell?'
description: Trent Alexander-Arnold enjoyed wild celebrations with Liverpool fans after moving them to within three points of the Premier League title. But was it a farewell?

title: Lions RB Jahmyr Gibbs among stars in attendance at WrestleMania 41 in Las Vegas
description: Lions RB Jahmyr Gibbs among stars in attendance at WrestleMania 41 in Las Vegas

title: WrestleMania 41 results: Joe Hendry shockingly answers Randy Orton's challenge, gets demolished
description: Joe Hendry's shocking WrestleMania 41 debut did not go as expected against Randy Orton.
author: Drake Riggs
